title: I'm done. Match making if so wrong, I need some players with basic game knowlege
body:
Need some players that have basic game knowledge to play with. I'm at my wits end with the lack of game awareness in my games. All I want is to enjoy my game but when you get your team initing (not even deliberately but just purely lack of game knowledge) it gets super frustrating. I'm a chill player but thinking of quitting because it is just absolutely ridiculous atm.  

I'm not asking for the best players just want to have fun in my games again. Hit me up if you think you can help.

To fit my narrative? I have been chat banned 3 times since November 2018, for reacting to these type of people that want negatively impact games. 

I am stating that there is little incentive to not to troll and greif, and that behavior is occurring more and more in my games. you can get chat banned consistantly from single games chat logs, however, you can troll singular games and get away with it, that is a fact, chat is too strict and encourages people to throw games instead because the system is bias'd towards the chat log

as an ADC I did try and communicate until I went to settings and turned chat off two days ago. I inform my supports when I am wanting to freeze lane, if I want to push etc. and I will use pings too. As an example 2 days ago, I had a senna support who was auto filled. she didn't press Q at all until like 15 minutes, we we received a gank at 3-4 minutes, she Q'd a ward and walked back to the tower, that isn't playing bad that is trolling/greifing. I check the players match history and the games the summoner wasn't ADC were loses and she has a stupid amount of deaths for the time length of games. 

I do not judge players that are doing stuff like constantly fighting when they are behind and so on, but my games I either have people who are clearly griefing, trolling or just afk. And with the chat log being so strict, you can not say that the penalty system is bias'd towards the chat log.

The fact that that senna is still playing games and hasn't received a penalty, yet people can get chat banned from a single games without using hate speech. is pretty much proof that the system is not balanced. The way it is, at least in my mind you are more so allowed to troll than if loose your cool in games and say one line in chat, boom get chat penalized and wait 3-6 months to get your end of season rewards.
At least with Dota you get penalized for anything you can't play the main game modes, and you have a huge queue timer. and that gives a reason for people not to be idiots. however in league, you get penalized you can still keep playing the main game modes.

I would agree that it's easy to get away with trolling. I guess that the mechanics behind telling if someone is new or just trolling is hard?? 

For me its more that if i get an S- and everyone on my team get C's and D's then why was I matched with them conversely If I get a C or D and they got an S why was I matched with them . 

It's a team game and I find that the skill difference in the teams are not very consistent or accurate. I get it must be hard to have match making that suits everyone because you can have bad games, new players ect. But there should be a base line thats better than what we have. If you get matched on the expected losing team 6 games out of 10 and get an S rate and lose in those games I find that a bit unfair. You don't get to choose your team and even if you play well in the team and try to carry you get penalised LP for playing well, that sucks abit and it gets frustrating.

So really just looking for people with basic knowledge of the game so I don't get stuck in as many games where a lane loses turret before 10mins. :) <3
